items.name: Eyes of the Greatwolf
flavourText: I am but a vessel for a greater force.
It acts through me. Speaks through me.
Decides what lives and dies through me.
And will change the world through me.

items.name: Dying Sun
enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect
explicitMods: 12% increased Area of Effect during Effect
Skills fire 2 additional Projectiles during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: All things must die.
Whether you burn out or explode is up to you.

items.name: Fate Lash
explicitMods: Reflects 4 Physical Damage to Melee Attackers

8 to 13 Added Spell Fire Damage while Dual Wielding
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an Abyssal Socket on an Item or into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Onslaught Talons
enchantMods: Trigger Commandment of Winter when Hit
implicitMods: Inflict Cold Exposure on Hit, applying -12% to Cold Resistance
20% chance to Unnerve Enemies for 4 seconds on Hit

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, causing them to be debilitated when they hit enemies and increasing damage they take while on low life.
explicitMods: Cursed Enemies take 58% increased Damage while on Low Life
Cursed Enemies are Debilitated for 2.00 Seconds when they Hit
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Performing any skill replaces this buff with one that boosts melee physical damage of skills you use yourself (it will not apply to your melee skills used by totems). Consumes Frenzy Charges to increase duration.
explicitMods: 100% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 40% increased Damage from Projectile Hits
Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 4 additional targets
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 70 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 3272 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect

items.name: Heartbound Loop
explicitMods: Minions have 10% increased Area of Effect
420 Physical Damage taken on Minion Death
flavourText: When the axe finally fell, Seryl shared his pain,
and the last thought that flickered through his
fading mind was her broken, shattered scream.

enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect

items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

tireless and true,
he fights for me,
he fights for you!

items.name: The Annihilating Light
enchantMods: Quality does not increase Physical Damage
Grants 1% increased Elemental Damage per 2% Quality
explicitMods: Deal Triple Damage with Elemental Skills

than the scintillating light of utter clarity.

socketedItems.secDescrText: An icy projectile which has a chance to freeze enemies it passes through. The projectile fades quickly, reducing damage and freezing chance until it dissipates.
explicitMods:
Projectiles continuously lose Damage, up to 50% less Damage by the time they dissipate
Projectiles have 25% chance to Freeze, which is lost over the first quarter of their flight
